
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/19065784" title="发布于 2025-08-30 13:18">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一款基于 .NET 开源、功能全面的微信小程序商城系统</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家分享一款基于原生微信小程序 + .NET Core + <span>Layui 技术构建、开源（GPL-3.0）、功能全面的微信小程序商城系统：UrShop。</span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>UrShop 是一款基于原生微信小程序 + .NET Core + Layui 技术构建、开源（GPL-3.0）、功能全面的微信小程序商城系统，项目包微信小程序端和后台管理端。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>功能模块</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131456592-1791227797.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源代码</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong>项目结构：</strong></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31TueHTamCBX3IVKFtYtFePs0LzXuA52mC8MUWoicJVhNlvh4BbdAMl4ZFUmRnkLCxK0iaVO6HGNicVD/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>UrShop<br><span>|--Urs.Shop&nbsp;<br><span>|--Urs.Shop-Area-Admin 后台管理<br><span>|--Urs.Services 接口服务<br><span>|--Urs.Data 领域实体与映射<br><span>|--Urs.Data-Domain 领域实体<br><span>|--Urs.Data-Mapping 领域映射<br><span>|--Urs.Core 核心接口与封装<br><span>|--Urs.Framework 辅助框架<br><span>|--Plugins 插件中心<br><span>|--Plugins-Plugin.Api 商城接口插件<br><span>|--Plugins-Plugin.ExternalAuth.WeixinOpen 微信授权插件<br><span>|--Plugins-Plugin.Payments.WeixinOpen 微信支持插件<br><span>|--Plugins-Plugin.Shipping.ByWeight 按重量计费插件<br><span>|--miniprogram 微信小程序原生商城<br><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131509151-1839527915.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131512930-1410442768.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131610171-1266429844.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目技术栈</span></h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr><th><span>框架</span></th><th><span>名称</span></th></tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><span>AspNet MVC</span></td>
<td><span>MVC框架</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>WebApi</span></td>
<td><span>接口框架</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>EntityFramework</span></td>
<td><span>ORM工具</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>Autofac</span></td>
<td><span>IOC框架</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>AutoMapper</span></td>
<td><span>DTO映射</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>FluentValidation</span></td>
<td><span>验证组件</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>SwaggerUI</span></td>
<td><span>接口文档</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>QRCoder</span></td>
<td><span>二维码生成</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>Newtonsoft.Json</span></td>
<td><span>Json工具</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>Redis</span></td>
<td><span>高并发缓存</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>EPPlus</span></td>
<td><span>Excel工具</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>JwtBearer</span></td>
<td><span>授权认证</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>WeixinSDK</span></td>
<td><span>微信SDK</span></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>功能演示</span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>后台管理端</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131636678-1332035431.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>

<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131650253-525145163.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131657819-9873676.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131706074-1986474890.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131710948-1697218293.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131715520-130107361.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>

<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>微信小程序端</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250830131733873-2142280425.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码地址</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多项目实用功能和特性欢迎前往项目开源地址查看👀，别忘了给项目一个Star支持💖。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>Gitee开源地址：</strong><span>https://gitee.com/urselect/urshop</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该项目已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（<strong>让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞</strong><span>）。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHub开源地址：</strong><span>https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></li>
<li><strong>Gitee开源地址：</strong><span>https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
